content.html: it's so funny that JKR made a billion dollars and spends all her time miserable and tweeting. Suzanne Collins wrote the Hunger Games, made a billion dollars, then disappeared to the woods of Connecticut and has given like two interviews in the last 10 years. so much cooler
content.value:
it's so funny that JKR made a billion dollars and spends all her time miserable and tweeting. 

Suzanne Collins wrote the Hunger Games, made a billion dollars, then disappeared to the woods of Connecticut and has given like two interviews in the last 10 years. so much cooler
